page.title: 09KERRY 11yrs A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: On Fridays in the holidays,I go shop- ing with my mum and two sisters.We walk to Oakengates and meet my Nan in the market.There are lots of stalls selling jewellery,second-hand goods, clothes and wool as well as fish,meat and vegetables. Next we go to Saverite Supermarket where mum buys cereals, bread, butter, cheese, tinned food and cleaning materials.We spend about Â£15. Sometimes we go to the Post Office and my Nan buys stamps or pays a bill.We go on to the greengocers and Nan buys her fruit and vegetables.When we have done the shopping we walk across the park to my Nan's house. There we have a salad roll and a drink of Cola.Nan has a cup of tea. Afterwards we play in the park until it's time to go home.We go by taxi as the shopping is heavy.Dad comes in at 5 o'clock and we have liver,potatoes and beans for tea.
